bug.author: ry
bug.description:
The last arrow should originate from p_5. I'd photoshop it, but I imagine there's an source illustrator file somewhere which would be better to change. <denchmark-link:http://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/array_ops.md#gather>http://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/array_ops.md#gather</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/a9ca5173b2252b0de5dd754147b275e85298e522/tensorflow/g3doc/api_docs/images/Gather.png>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/a9ca5173b2252b0de5dd754147b275e85298e522/tensorflow/g3doc/api_docs/images/Gather.png</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Thanks for pointing it out. We will fix it at the source.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/colah>@colah</denchmark-link> , can you take a look at this?
